# OpenMetrics format examples for O-RAN components

# TYPE o_ran_requests_total counter
# HELP o_ran_requests_total Total number of HTTP requests processed by O-RAN components
o_ran_requests_total{component="orchestrator",namespace="o-ran-mano",pod="orchestrator-abc123",slice_id="slice-001",method="GET",endpoint="/api/v1/network-slices",status="200"} 1542
o_ran_requests_total{component="orchestrator",namespace="o-ran-mano",pod="orchestrator-abc123",slice_id="slice-001",method="POST",endpoint="/api/v1/network-slices",status="201"} 89
o_ran_requests_total{component="orchestrator",namespace="o-ran-mano",pod="orchestrator-abc123",slice_id="slice-001",method="GET",endpoint="/api/v1/health",status="200"} 3456
o_ran_requests_total{component="vnf-operator",namespace="o-ran-mano",pod="vnf-operator-xyz789",slice_id="slice-002",method="GET",endpoint="/metrics",status="200"} 2341
o_ran_requests_total{component="vnf-operator",namespace="o-ran-mano",pod="vnf-operator-xyz789",slice_id="slice-002",method="POST",endpoint="/api/v1/vnf-deployments",status="202"} 45
o_ran_requests_total{component="dms",namespace="o-ran-mano",pod="dms-def456",slice_id="slice-003",method="GET",endpoint="/api/v1/data-sources",status="200"} 567

# TYPE o_ran_request_duration_seconds histogram
# HELP o_ran_request_duration_seconds HTTP request duration in seconds
o_ran_request_duration_seconds_bucket{component="orchestrator",namespace="o-ran-mano",pod="orchestrator-abc123",slice_id="slice-001",method="GET",endpoint="/api/v1/network-slices",le="0.001"} 23
o_ran_request_duration_seconds_bucket{component="orchestrator",namespace="o-ran-mano",pod="orchestrator-abc123",slice_id="slice-001",method="GET",endpoint="/api/v1/network-slices",le="0.01"} 156
o_ran_request_duration_seconds_bucket{component="orchestrator",namespace="o-ran-mano",pod="orchestrator-abc123",slice_id="slice-001",method="GET",endpoint="/api/v1/network-slices",le="0.1"} 1234
o_ran_request_duration_seconds_bucket{component="orchestrator",namespace="o-ran-mano",pod="orchestrator-abc123",slice_id="slice-001",method="GET",endpoint="/api/v1/network-slices",le="1.0"} 1541
o_ran_request_duration_seconds_bucket{component="orchestrator",namespace="o-ran-mano",pod="orchestrator-abc123",slice_id="slice-001",method="GET",endpoint="/api/v1/network-slices",le="+Inf"} 1542
o_ran_request_duration_seconds_sum{component="orchestrator",namespace="o-ran-mano",pod="orchestrator-abc123",slice_id="slice-001",method="GET",endpoint="/api/v1/network-slices"} 45.67
o_ran_request_duration_seconds_count{component="orchestrator",namespace="o-ran-mano",pod="orchestrator-abc123",slice_id="slice-001",method="GET",endpoint="/api/v1/network-slices"} 1542

# TYPE o_ran_cpu_usage gauge
# HELP o_ran_cpu_usage Current CPU usage percentage (0-1) of O-RAN components
o_ran_cpu_usage{component="orchestrator",namespace="o-ran-mano",pod="orchestrator-abc123",slice_id="slice-001"} 0.25
o_ran_cpu_usage{component="vnf-operator",namespace="o-ran-mano",pod="vnf-operator-xyz789",slice_id="slice-002",vnf_type="du",operator_mode="active"} 0.67
o_ran_cpu_usage{component="dms",namespace="o-ran-mano",pod="dms-def456",slice_id="slice-003",dms_role="primary"} 0.12

# TYPE o_ran_memory_usage gauge
# HELP o_ran_memory_usage Current memory usage in bytes of O-RAN components
o_ran_memory_usage{component="orchestrator",namespace="o-ran-mano",pod="orchestrator-abc123",slice_id="slice-001"} 536870912
o_ran_memory_usage{component="vnf-operator",namespace="o-ran-mano",pod="vnf-operator-xyz789",slice_id="slice-002",vnf_type="du"} 1073741824
o_ran_memory_usage{component="dms",namespace="o-ran-mano",pod="dms-def456",slice_id="slice-003",dms_role="primary"} 268435456

# TYPE o_ran_memory_limit gauge
# HELP o_ran_memory_limit Memory limit in bytes configured for O-RAN components
o_ran_memory_limit{component="orchestrator",namespace="o-ran-mano",pod="orchestrator-abc123",slice_id="slice-001"} 1073741824
o_ran_memory_limit{component="vnf-operator",namespace="o-ran-mano",pod="vnf-operator-xyz789",slice_id="slice-002",vnf_type="du"} 2147483648
o_ran_memory_limit{component="dms",namespace="o-ran-mano",pod="dms-def456",slice_id="slice-003",dms_role="primary"} 536870912

# TYPE o_ran_network_bytes_total counter
# HELP o_ran_network_bytes_total Total network bytes transmitted/received by O-RAN components
o_ran_network_bytes_total{component="orchestrator",namespace="o-ran-mano",pod="orchestrator-abc123",slice_id="slice-001",direction="rx"} 12345678
o_ran_network_bytes_total{component="orchestrator",namespace="o-ran-mano",pod="orchestrator-abc123",slice_id="slice-001",direction="tx"} 9876543
o_ran_network_bytes_total{component="vnf-operator",namespace="o-ran-mano",pod="vnf-operator-xyz789",slice_id="slice-002",direction="rx",vnf_type="du"} 23456789
o_ran_network_bytes_total{component="vnf-operator",namespace="o-ran-mano",pod="vnf-operator-xyz789",slice_id="slice-002",direction="tx",vnf_type="du"} 18765432

# TYPE o_ran_active_connections gauge
# HELP o_ran_active_connections Number of active connections to O-RAN components
o_ran_active_connections{component="orchestrator",namespace="o-ran-mano",pod="orchestrator-abc123",slice_id="slice-001"} 42
o_ran_active_connections{component="vnf-operator",namespace="o-ran-mano",pod="vnf-operator-xyz789",slice_id="slice-002",vnf_type="du"} 18
o_ran_active_connections{component="dms",namespace="o-ran-mano",pod="dms-def456",slice_id="slice-003",dms_role="primary"} 7

# TYPE o_ran_vnf_deployments_total counter
# HELP o_ran_vnf_deployments_total Total number of VNF deployments managed by VNF operator
o_ran_vnf_deployments_total{component="vnf-operator",namespace="o-ran-mano",pod="vnf-operator-xyz789",slice_id="slice-002",vnf_type="du",status="successful"} 25
o_ran_vnf_deployments_total{component="vnf-operator",namespace="o-ran-mano",pod="vnf-operator-xyz789",slice_id="slice-002",vnf_type="cu",status="successful"} 15
o_ran_vnf_deployments_total{component="vnf-operator",namespace="o-ran-mano",pod="vnf-operator-xyz789",slice_id="slice-002",vnf_type="du",status="failed"} 2
o_ran_vnf_deployments_total{component="vnf-operator",namespace="o-ran-mano",pod="vnf-operator-xyz789",slice_id="slice-002",vnf_type="cu",status="failed"} 1

# TYPE o_ran_vnf_deployment_duration_seconds histogram
# HELP o_ran_vnf_deployment_duration_seconds Time taken to deploy VNFs in seconds
o_ran_vnf_deployment_duration_seconds_bucket{component="vnf-operator",namespace="o-ran-mano",pod="vnf-operator-xyz789",slice_id="slice-002",vnf_type="du",le="30"} 5
o_ran_vnf_deployment_duration_seconds_bucket{component="vnf-operator",namespace="o-ran-mano",pod="vnf-operator-xyz789",slice_id="slice-002",vnf_type="du",le="60"} 15
o_ran_vnf_deployment_duration_seconds_bucket{component="vnf-operator",namespace="o-ran-mano",pod="vnf-operator-xyz789",slice_id="slice-002",vnf_type="du",le="120"} 23
o_ran_vnf_deployment_duration_seconds_bucket{component="vnf-operator",namespace="o-ran-mano",pod="vnf-operator-xyz789",slice_id="slice-002",vnf_type="du",le="300"} 25
o_ran_vnf_deployment_duration_seconds_bucket{component="vnf-operator",namespace="o-ran-mano",pod="vnf-operator-xyz789",slice_id="slice-002",vnf_type="du",le="+Inf"} 25
o_ran_vnf_deployment_duration_seconds_sum{component="vnf-operator",namespace="o-ran-mano",pod="vnf-operator-xyz789",slice_id="slice-002",vnf_type="du"} 1876.5
o_ran_vnf_deployment_duration_seconds_count{component="vnf-operator",namespace="o-ran-mano",pod="vnf-operator-xyz789",slice_id="slice-002",vnf_type="du"} 25

# TYPE o_ran_data_sources_total counter
# HELP o_ran_data_sources_total Total number of data sources managed by DMS
o_ran_data_sources_total{component="dms",namespace="o-ran-mano",pod="dms-def456",slice_id="slice-003",dms_role="primary",source_type="telemetry"} 134
o_ran_data_sources_total{component="dms",namespace="o-ran-mano",pod="dms-def456",slice_id="slice-003",dms_role="primary",source_type="configuration"} 67
o_ran_data_sources_total{component="dms",namespace="o-ran-mano",pod="dms-def456",slice_id="slice-003",dms_role="primary",source_type="performance"} 89

# TYPE o_ran_data_ingestion_rate gauge
# HELP o_ran_data_ingestion_rate Current data ingestion rate in bytes per second
o_ran_data_ingestion_rate{component="dms",namespace="o-ran-mano",pod="dms-def456",slice_id="slice-003",dms_role="primary",source_type="telemetry"} 1048576
o_ran_data_ingestion_rate{component="dms",namespace="o-ran-mano",pod="dms-def456",slice_id="slice-003",dms_role="primary",source_type="performance"} 524288

# TYPE o_ran_slice_bandwidth_utilization gauge
# HELP o_ran_slice_bandwidth_utilization Network slice bandwidth utilization percentage (0-1)
o_ran_slice_bandwidth_utilization{component="orchestrator",namespace="o-ran-mano",pod="orchestrator-abc123",slice_id="slice-001",slice_type="embb"} 0.75
o_ran_slice_bandwidth_utilization{component="orchestrator",namespace="o-ran-mano",pod="orchestrator-abc123",slice_id="slice-002",slice_type="urllc"} 0.45
o_ran_slice_bandwidth_utilization{component="orchestrator",namespace="o-ran-mano",pod="orchestrator-abc123",slice_id="slice-003",slice_type="mmtc"} 0.23

# TYPE o_ran_slice_latency_seconds gauge
# HELP o_ran_slice_latency_seconds Current network slice latency in seconds
o_ran_slice_latency_seconds{component="orchestrator",namespace="o-ran-mano",pod="orchestrator-abc123",slice_id="slice-001",slice_type="embb"} 0.010
o_ran_slice_latency_seconds{component="orchestrator",namespace="o-ran-mano",pod="orchestrator-abc123",slice_id="slice-002",slice_type="urllc"} 0.001
o_ran_slice_latency_seconds{component="orchestrator",namespace="o-ran-mano",pod="orchestrator-abc123",slice_id="slice-003",slice_type="mmtc"} 0.050

# TYPE up gauge
# HELP up Whether the O-RAN component is up and responding
up{component="orchestrator",namespace="o-ran-mano",pod="orchestrator-abc123",slice_id="slice-001"} 1
up{component="vnf-operator",namespace="o-ran-mano",pod="vnf-operator-xyz789",slice_id="slice-002"} 1
up{component="dms",namespace="o-ran-mano",pod="dms-def456",slice_id="slice-003"} 1

# TYPE scrape_duration_seconds gauge
# HELP scrape_duration_seconds Duration of the last scrape in seconds
scrape_duration_seconds{component="orchestrator",namespace="o-ran-mano",pod="orchestrator-abc123"} 0.045
scrape_duration_seconds{component="vnf-operator",namespace="o-ran-mano",pod="vnf-operator-xyz789"} 0.032
scrape_duration_seconds{component="dms",namespace="o-ran-mano",pod="dms-def456"} 0.028

# TYPE scrape_samples_scraped gauge
# HELP scrape_samples_scraped Number of samples scraped in the last scrape
scrape_samples_scraped{component="orchestrator",namespace="o-ran-mano",pod="orchestrator-abc123"} 156
scrape_samples_scraped{component="vnf-operator",namespace="o-ran-mano",pod="vnf-operator-xyz789"} 234
scrape_samples_scraped{component="dms",namespace="o-ran-mano",pod="dms-def456"} 189

# EOF
